page.title: 18HEALTH : CHERRY WILLINGHAM
page.content: There is a community health centre in Cherry Willingham which is on the 'Parade'. It has five doctors and a community nurse. It also dispenses medicines because there is no local chemist. Two doctors are on duty at any surgery because the practice also takes in the health centre at Nettleham. There is also a small surgery at Reepham. The main surgery is open for five mornings a week and recently the surgery has started opening on two evenings a week (4.00pm-6.00pm). At other times patients have to go to Nettleham which is open all day. Doctors normally see people by appointment but it is possible to see the doctors without an appointment. Lincoln is the nearest hospital. It is 4km. away and without a car can be difficult to get to.
